body.name: StepLively Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work, Comfortable Foot Stool with 2 Adjustable Heights, Footrest with Washable Cover, for Back & Hip Pain Relief, Suitable for Office, Home and Car (Black)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 32 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: [Comfortable Experience] Steplively foot rest has two layers: the lower layer is 2.0" thick, and the upper layer is 3.7" thick. The ergonomic design of the foot rest gives you freedom to choose the proper height according to your needs and to better relieve the pressure on your limbs for long periods of sitting.

[Adjustable Height] StepLively foot rest has two-piece removable footrest with magic tapes between the upper and lower layers so that you can adjust the height of the foot rest according to your usage needs. When you want to add the height of the foot stool, you only need to pull the zipper and magic tapes between the two layers of the foot rest to switch the thickness for a higher height. Want it lower? Simply remove the bottom flat piece.

[High Quality] The core of StepLively foot pillow is made of high-quality foam, which is supportive and does not easily collapse or lose shape. The bottom of the foot pillow is made with a non-slip design, which ensures that the foot pillow does not easily shift when being used. The cover of the foot pillow is made of machine washable velvet fabric, which is attractive and comfortable.

[Easy to Clean] The cover of the StepLively foot rest is installed with a zipper so that it can be easily removed for machine washing. When the cover of foot rest is dirty, simply wash in the washing machine. The foot rest‘s fabric is durable that ensures the foot rest cannot be destroyed even after many uses and washes.

[Multi-Use] StepLively foot rest not only can be used as the traditional footrest under desk, but also may be used under the knee on a bed or sofa to provide extra support for lower back pain while lying down or sleeping. Flip it over and it turns into a rocking pedal to help you relax and relieve stress or boredom. The bottom of the foot rest has an anti-slip design, so you don't have to worry about the foot rest shifting when using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is amazing!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for something to put under my desk to rest my feet on and this is it!! I had tried hard boxes and and plastic boxes putting pillows on top, anything to rest my feet on a raise them up. None of them worked.This is PERFECT! It's extremely well made and solid. It's just the right height and it is sooooo soft and comfy on my feet. It has grippers on the bottom so it doesn't slide around and the size is just perfect for under my desk.HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Whoever designed this knew what they were doing. I was skeptical - to pay for something to put my feet up on. But I had to concede there were better things than the boxes and crates I was going through. But it does what it says it does. It sees to be just the right height, and it's actually comfortable for my feet! I got one for home and office. Outstanding product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product does work great. It relieves the pressure in my back because I sit all day. It's soft and I love that you can take off the cover and wash it. The only reason I gave it 4 stars is because it is NOT adjustable as advertised. I ordered this one because it said it was adjustable but it isn't. Overall it's worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical, but this is a great foot rest. I have short legs and new desk chair doesn’t go low enough for my feet to rest flat on the floor. This is the perfect height. My feet rest very comfortably and the fabric is super soft. As a bonus, it keeps my feet a little warmer too. And the little grippers on the bottom keep it from sliding around on my laminate floor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so much better then the hard plastic ones
reviews.reviewText: My son has such long legs lol. we had a hard plastic foot stool but it just wasn't cutting it. I ordered this for him and he raves about it. whether he is stretching out and its his legs or ankles or he is gaming and using it for his feet, its soft but sturdy and so worth it. The hard plastic ones we all used for years, this one I think is us evolving in that fact . Take care of your body, it doesn't cost a lot so easy to check out if right for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The item is very soft to the touch but I thougt the product would expand more over time but it didn’t so I have to put my chair lower and that defeats the purpose

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is an incredible item. It came so tightly packed in plastic that i thought it was the wrong item. Take off the plastic wrap and it expands to three times the size! It is soft and perfect height and width. The best dark blue nearly black color. Feels amazing and works perfect. Has a zipper for the bottom piece. Incredible item.Smells perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where has this been all my life?
reviews.reviewText: when I first opened it, I thought, oh no, this is not gonna work. But I tried it and oh so glad I did. So nice to rest your feet on this, makes my desk that much more comfortable.
Me acaba de llegar, lo probé y lo sentí muy cómodo para reposar mis pies, se puede subir a la cama 👍
price reasonable when i put my feet on the foot rest, I feel the relief in my back pressure , it is worth the investment
